Specimen Type: Blood or tissue sample (for DNA extraction)
Purpose: To detect mutations in genes associated with Lynch Syndrome (e.g., MLH1, MSH2, MSH6, PMS2, EPCAM).
Container: Not specified in SOP (commonly EDTA tube for blood or appropriate tissue container)
Equipment: Spectrophotometer/fluorometer, thermal cycler, gel electrophoresis apparatus, sequencing platform (Sanger or NGS)
